item.title: Potholes and road damage old Reddings road, 19th June
item.description:
There are a number of potholes (deepest pictured)and /road surface damage along old Reddings road, particularly outside our house (Domus). On one section the road surface is coming off. These have been present and getting worse over the last year or so. There is a nursery at the end of the road so itâ€™s a higher volume area than one might expect.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Old Reddings Road, Hatherley, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Pot holes left by water main leak, 19th June
item.description:
A couple of months back a water main burst outside the gates of UCAS. This caused a number of pot holes in the road. For some reason the company who repaired the leak only repaired the main pot hole caused, not all of the other smaller holes. Severn Trent should be held responsible for fixing all of the pot holes their leak caused, rather than leaving a load in the road
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): New Barn Lane, Marle Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Tree is damaged problem, 19th June
item.description:

item.title: 22080258 update, 19th June
item.description:
Thank you. The drains do get cleaned and the road gets swept regularly. There is an underground blockage between two of the drains. Sweeping the road makes no difference. Please ask for an underground inspection this problem is years old
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 35, Cirencester Road, Cheltenham

item.title: Traffic light is stuck on Red. It only works if cars come from the opposite side., 19th June
